code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){let{onLogin}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!name.trim()){setError('Please enter your name');return;}try{onLogin(name);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"background-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/cat.gif",alt:"Animated cat",className:"background-gif"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Thanks for helping me name my cat!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Enter your name to start rating cat names"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter your name",className:"login-input",autoFocus:true}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"start-button",disabled:!name.trim(),children:"Start Rating Names"})]})]})})]});}export default Login;
